title: New: Olivera – Flow
body:
So she’s already proved her top line capabilities by featuring on a [John Dahlback tune](https://soundcloud.

com/armadatrice/john-dahlback-feat-olivera-shooting-star-preview), but this debut solo offering from Finland’s **Olivera** is far more up my street than the ‘progressive house’ of Dahlback. _Flow_ is effortlessly pop, think Passion Pit, CHVRCHES or M83, in it’s brilliant extravagance; heady synths and perfect vocals. Early days, but there’s enough to suggest that this twenty year old could have a very bright future ahead of her. Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks. ([Props](https://soundcloud.com/indie-curator))
